title: Sajith ready to accept premiership under four conditions
body_lines: Opposition Leader Sajith Premadasa says, as the leader of Samagi Jana Balawegaya, he is ready to accept the premiership under four conditions.
In a letter directed to President Gotabaya Rajapaksa today (May 12), Premadasa said, the Samagi Jana Balawegaya, as the main opposition, is prepared to form a short-term government.
